h3_title: Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Battle - Old Ginseng Guai
content: You can also find a higher path leading back to the main road through the valley, and fend off the various Frozen Corpses along the ridgeline path.

You can also find a higher path leading back to the main road through the valley, and fend off the various Frozen Corpses along the ridgeline path.
